title: Testing is Critical
content: In advertising, the only real risk is standing still. It's a controlled gamble — a responsible way to explore the unknown. The goal of a test is to evaluate a hypothesis. It can be based on extensive technical analysis like MMMs, in‑platform tests, or simply the intuition of stakeholders.

title: Understanding Treatment Groups
content: When running a marketing experiment, one of the most important decisions you'll make is who will receive your treatment — the treatment group. This group is the population exposed to your campaign, offer, or intervention, with the goal of influencing their behavior in a measurable way.
